property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, for each player that has more shields than you do, shieldify the top card of your deck. ■ Whenever one of your shields would be broken, you may tap one of your creatures instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ Whenever this creature taps, this creature gets +3000 power for each of your other tapped creatures until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 3 or more elements that have different costs, this creature costs 5 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1. ■ When you put this creature or it taps, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
